      As the index of a file may change, please use getConnectorCSV(String) with a path from the getPath method of Constants.FileName

    • getConnectorCSV

      public static ConnectorCSV getConnectorCSV​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.IOException
      Method for connecting to a specific CSV file specified by its path
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the file, retrieve it from Constants.FileName
      Returns:
      ConnectorCSV
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an error on reading the file occurs

    • getConnectorCSV

    • readAllPatternsOfFile

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readAllPatternsOfFile​(int index, boolean pentaho) throws java.io.IOException
      Method for reading all regex patterns in the respective file
      Parameters:
      index - the file index, sorted alphabetically
      pentaho - checks if file is accessed from pentaho
      Returns:
      list of strings containing regex patterns
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
